ygData.msgSnippet: The Major smiled and took Deathsteel s shoulder. Tyrael: Then I am proud to give you this assignment, Deathsteel. Serve us well and valiantly! He then returned

The Major smiled and took Deathsteel's shoulder.

Tyrael: Then I am proud to give you this assignment, Deathsteel. Serve
us well and valiantly!

He then returned to address Dreadplague and Darkangel.

Tyrael: So, Darkangel, you seem to have scouted the area between Pred
and Maxi base, right?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> DeathSteel::
> 
> He smiled. "I shall take the assignment. I'll have thier shields down 
> in no time."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > tYRAEL: No. You are still programed as a Predacon. Thus, they'll 
> have
> > it easy on you and will let you in their group in no time. That's 
> the
> > mission I want to give you.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > DeathSteel::
> > > 
> > > He looked at Tyrael. "You want me to infiltrate the maximals and 
> > > lower thier shields when you come in for the attack?"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > Tyrael: I believe you misunderstand my intentions. I want you 
> there 
> > > in
> > > > order to disable their defenses and to prepare the way for when 
> we
> > > > destroy them.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > DeathSteel::
> > > > > 
> > > > > He looked at Tyrael. "You wish me to spy on my fellow 
> > > predacons.Then 
> > > > > there is a reason not to trust."  He looked down in 
> thought. "You 
> > > ask 
> > > > > this to protect the predacons from tretchery. Is there a bot 
> > > > > inparticular you wish me to look after?"
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> 
> wrote:
> > > > > > Tyrael: Yes. Since you are new here and no one knows you, I 
> > > thought
> > > > > > you might become our eyes and ears in the Predacons. Your 
> > > reaction?
> > > > > >
